publishing_focus.primary_focus: Classic and contemporary manga webtoons across all genres
publishing_focus.target_audience: Manga lovers and those new to the genre, aged 15 and above
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our dedicated manga team possesses deep knowledge of the genre, enabling us to select and translate high-quality content that resonates globally
publishing_focus.example_titles: Titles like 'Naruto' and 'One Piece'; authors similar to Fujiko F. Fujio
